column4: does anyone know how to enable channels 12 and 13 on a broadcom wl adapter?
you may need to use iwconfig to set the channel
there's a problem with the broadcom driver - it does not allow channels 12 and 13
it's something related to the region
12 and 13 are not allowed in the US
but are used in Europe
I see, Wasn't aware of them (UK based here)
but I could not figure out how to make the driver accept the fact that I'm actually located in Europe
none of the recommendations I found in google worked for me
do you have channels 12 and 13 allowed on your system?
not sure, I havent messed with it that much
a simple sudo iwlist eth1 channel (your wireless instead of eth1) will list all available channels
I'm asking, because if you have 12 and 13, I could ask where did you get your drivers :)
i'm not at home to see, i'm at work so I can't check. Sorry
let me check then
i am ssh'd to my server
this is a mission. I purposefully crippled my wireless as I use wired on it now
I c
anyway, 10x :)
brb
